00506                 static bool mShuttingDown;
00507 
00519                 static void threadUpdate()
00520                 {
00521                         while(!mShuttingDown)
00522                         {
00523                                 OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton().processQueuedSounds();
00524                                 OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton().updateBuffers();
00525                                 mUpdateThread->yield();
00526                         }
00527                 }
